channel.title: Work on Grommit Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Grommit Studios

item.title: DARK
item.description: A website trivia for the Netflix series Dark. A trivia quiz spanning all three seasons. The idea first started as a piece of paper job to test one of our brothers and his friends. Since they were taking it remotely online, we decided to make it into a website. WARNING: Spoiler alert If you haven’t see the series, we highly recommend it. Take the DARK trivia.
